## Q3 {-}
Solve for x:\
2.1. $\sqrt[4]{x-4}=5$\
2.2. $x^4=2^8$\
2.3. $x^{0.5}=23$\
2.4. $8^{2-x}=2^{4+3x}$\
2.5. $2^{3x}=10$\
2.6. $5^{3-x}=625$\
2.7. $7^{2-x}=4^{2x+3}$\
2.8. $16=8^{3-7x}$\
2.9. $e^{3-8x}-9=0$\
2.10. $e^{4-3x}+8=12$\
2.11. $\sqrt[3]{2^{4x}-4}=5$\
2.12. $\sqrt[3]{e^{2x}-13}=81^{\frac{1}{4}}$\
2.13. $\frac{5xa^{-7}b^{9}}{9a^2b^{-10}} = \frac{25b^{19}}{3a^9}$\
